title: By the Quene the Quenes Maiestie vnderstandyng that of late tyme sundrye persons beyng infected with certayne daungerous and pernicious opinions in matters of religion, contrary to the faith of the church of Christe, as Anabaptistes ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted at London in Powles Church yarde by Rycharde Iugge, and Iohn Cawood ...,
